snippet: Judge Ortrie Smith ruled on Friday in Federal District Court that Missouri’s ban on same-sex marriage violates the United States Constitution’s guarantees of due process and equal protection.
abstract: Judge Ortrie Smith rules that Missouri's ban on same-sex marriage violates United States Constitution's guarantees of due process and equal protection, decision that is expected to extend the right of same-sex couples to marry in the state.
lead_paragraph: Judge Ortrie Smith ruled on Friday in Federal District Court that Missouri’s ban on same-sex marriage violates the United States Constitution’s guarantees of due process and equal protection.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
